channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: We find out how it all started in 'Super Duper Bunnies!', then in 'Ye Olde Sourbreath!', the evil Lord Sourman and his dragon go on a rampage, so the bunnies must dish out sweet justice. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm and the Lost Talisman: Gargamel is looking for a talisman that will help him to find the Smurfies' village. Storm decides that she's going to get there before him. But it's a trap! (S4, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami that flies away in 'A Pinata For Mami', then in 'Invisi-Swiper', Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in 'Pups Save the Treasure Cruise', then in 'Pups Save Rocket Ryder', Ryder and Alex get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV. (S8, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin in 'Pups Save A Teeny Tiny Penguin', then in 'Pups Save the Cat Show', Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running wild.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit save a town from being pulled underground in 'The Secret of the Sand Serpent', and in 'The Disappearance of Peggy Scratch', the pals search for the leader after a flight test. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange case in 'The Frozen Stowaways', then in 'The Puzzle of the Empty Pond', a salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Game Show: It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! CatRat leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Ben & Holly: When a spell accidentally goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they can play with Lucy and her friends, and want to stay big forever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; Lucky Hamper: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Big Hill; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Police Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humdingder turns into a baby in 'Pups Save Baby Humdinger', then in 'Pups Save a Pinata', Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation. (S7, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Taxi: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping off, but that's not the last trip of the day for her.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playing Pretend: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre and needs fixing, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Scooters: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be faster to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles: Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to pop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.desc: Molly Mole; Soft Play: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Station: Oh, no! George has lost Mr. Dinosaur! Maybe the police can help George find him.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isla and her Chihuahua, Gizmo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To find and rescue the lost penguins in the jungle and bring them back to safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Little Trev's Turtle: Big Trev tells a childhood story while waiting for his old turtle friend, Salty.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Everything Day: Pounce tries to fit everything into one day with his dad but forgets safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat the Bandit: More friendly adventures in Gabby's Dollhouse. (S1, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must defend the fans at the Important City ballpark in 'Lizard Lips!', then in 'Space Pirates!', a Space Pirate Captain who threatens to ruin the party plans for Derek's birthday. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Someone's snatching all the fruit in 'The Mysterious Fruit Thief', then in 'The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards', the agents try to bring some peace to a pair of brawling gila monsters. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Boots win the Rainforest Race in 'Rainforest Race', then in 'Bok Bok Birthday', Dora invites friends to Big Red Chicken's birthday party. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Lexi, Levi, and Will, a friendly German Shepherd, as they embark on a rescue mission to find a lost bag of dog treats hidden somewhere in the garden.

channel.desc: Kiddie Workout: At playgroup, Madame Gazelle has invited Mr Potato to lead Peppa and her friends in a wonderfully fun musical.

channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Toy Robot: Out playing in the meadow, Holly, Ben and their friends find a broken toy robot. Holly fixes it with magic, but the robot does not behave as they thought it would.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: After Thomas, Percy and Diesel accidentally break a windmill, they all tell Gordon different version of what happened. Can Gordon uncover the truth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Yong Bao's fear of creepy crawlies and Carly's disgust for skunks complicate their apple delivery to the Harvest Festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Beach N Bush: Gemma and Spyke take cadets on an adventure to decide if the beach or bush is best.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Stumpy tests the bunnies' patience in 'Awesome Guy!', and in 'Cheese Zombies!', the bunnies go toe-to-toe with Dr. Fuzzleglove when he unleashes a stinky horde of zombies on Important City. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We find out who can scare Storm in 'Scary Stories', then in 'The Smurf Who Lost His Shadow', Hefty's shadow wants to be free, but once they're separated, they're both in danger. (S4, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots want to be big, but becomes way too big in 'Big Big Boots', then in 'Backpack's Sticky Situation', Backpack can't open, so Dora takes her to Abuela. (S2, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must put pause their summer plans in 'Auntie Freeze!', then in 'Goin' Camping!', Annabelle takes the team camping without their powers, and must save the day when things go wrong. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Indie helps the pals rehome a lost bee in 'The Hunt for the Hidden Hive', then in 'The Trouble of the Toppled Trees', Sam and Kit try to uncover who has been chewing the forest trees. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Zack and his Bernese Mountain dog, Shelby, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their rescue mission? To find and help a lost baby dinosaur and reunite it with its family in the Jurassic Jungle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The New Wand: Wandy gets a cold and is taken ill, Holly is given a replacement wand. This new wand can do lots of things that Wandy can't, and soon becomes the favourite.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Superheroes: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: When Diesel hears a strange noise that sounds like a Swamp Monster, he gets too scared to pull deliveries through the area. It'll take some help from Bruno and Percy for Diesel to conquer his fear and.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: After Thomas, Percy and Diesel accidentally break a windmill, they all tell Gordon different version of what happened. Can Gordon uncover the truth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Snack Shack Comeback: Neville organizes a fundraiser when a storm damages Ferdinand's Snack Shack.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Everything Day: Pounce tries to fit everything into one day with his dad but forgets safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must defend the fans at the Important City ballpark in 'Lizard Lips!', then in 'Space Pirates!', a Space Pirate Captain who threatens to ruin the party plans for Derek's birthday. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel needs someone to watch over the Smurfs he's captured in 'Lucretia Seizes Power', then in 'Papa Smurf Lost His Mind', Papa Smurf loses his memory and starts acting like a child. (S4, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties in 'Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties', and in 'Pups Save Helo Humdinger', Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions. (S9, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a fun day in 'Pups Save the Skydivers', then in 'Pups Save the Cupcakes', Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder! (S7, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Something's funky in the food at a jungle resort in 'The Puzzle of the Poisonous Leaves', and in 'The Mystery of the Missing Hare', Snowshoe hares need to find a missing camper. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam tries to blend in with a tough clan of hyenas in 'The Undercover Hyena', and in 'The Stranger in the Burrow', underground creatures start getting spooked by the burrow's new addition. (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Rangers: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden, and embark on a hiking adventure! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Made Up Musical Instruments; Flying Discs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Petting Farm; Mandy Mouse's Birthday: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fire Station Practice; Guinea Pigs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bowling; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Blimp', and then in 'Pups Save the Chili Cook-Off', Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The VIP: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf Takes a Holiday: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood; Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick; Jumping Stick; Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Ostrich: The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den; Staying Up Late: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV; Indoor Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Quiet Time: Bop and Boo make a beeline for a rock covered in many butterflies when they stop in the jungle, and they find out the rock is actually a crocodile. (S1, ep 49).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: An Extraordinary Tail: The Brave Bunnies stop in a jungle to collect seeds for their garden. Bop and Boo meet Percy, a proud peacock who can't resist boasting about his extraordinary tail. (S1, ep 41).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Savannah Race: In the sunny Savannah, Bop and Boo wait for Jeff, their car-loving giraffe friend. (S1, ep 43).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Swiper find his duplicates for a picnic in 'Too Many Swipers', and in 'Bateo's Home Run', Dora helps Bateo get to the baseball game. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Monster Toad: Frizzy and Spyke believe there's a monster toad at the lake and investigate. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Spyke's first day of training is filled with excitement, but she forgets to pay attention in class.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Cat Cam: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes silly pictures, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse! (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Stumpy tests the bunnies' patience in 'Awesome Guy!', and in 'Cheese Zombies!', the bunnies go toe-to-toe with Dr. Fuzzleglove when he unleashes a stinky horde of zombies on Important City. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isaac and his Cockapoo, Oreo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their rescue mission? To find and rescue seagulls stuck in tricky spots around the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus! (S7, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends: Two episodes.

channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canyon Country; Hollywood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Sea Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Police Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hop, Skip and Jump!; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups have a beach day with Gabriel in 'The Crew Builds a Ferris Wheel', then in 'The Crew Builds a Farm Animal Yoga Space', the Crew helps the farm animals relax. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Dress Up Chest: Gabby and Pandy go on a dress-up adventure in the dollhouse, wearing different costumes to help the Gabby Cats get out of some sticky situations. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef and Olly make snacks for Morton in 'Granola Bars', then in 'Nachos', Bonzo cooks with Chef for the first time. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's reflector causes a bridge to burn in 'Pups vs. The Hum-Flector', then in 'Pups Save a Capybara', the Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara. (S10, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift; What Babies Do: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.
